item.title: Getting started with tizen
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting tizen set up or installed. You can start developing Tizen apps on commercialized devices : https://wiki.tizen.org/wiki/Devices Or https://wiki.tizen.org/wiki/ReferenceDevices Last option is to install Tizen from scratch on existing Hardware (x86, ARM etc) : https://wiki.tizen.org/wiki/Category:Hardware
